main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Marrakech, French Morocco on 28 Aug 1952, tracked by radar at high speed during a rapid descent.
interesting points: The object was recorded on radar moving at a speed of 1197 mph during a 57-second observation., The object displayed a rapid descent and engaged at a specific course of 5 degrees., A possible radar malfunction was noted in the comments of the report., The observation was part of a historical investigation by Project Blue Book., The sighting also included multiple military personnel as observers.
witness description: military personnel present during the radar tracking of the object
